Website Name: TechVibe
Primary Purpose: Online marketplace for electronic device transactions (buying, selling, renting, leasing, giving away) and repair service discovery.

Core Offerings:
- Device Marketplace: Buy, Sell, Rent, Lease, Give Away electronic devices.
- Device Repair Locator: Find local repair services for electronic gadgets.
- Advanced Search: Efficiently discover devices.
- User Profiles: Personalized experience for buyers and sellers.
- Optional Paid Assistance: Enhanced support and services.

Key Specializations:
- Electronic Device Lifecycle Management
- Peer-to-Peer & Business-to-Consumer Device Transactions
- Localized Service Discovery (Repair)
- User Experience & Marketplace Security

Target Audience:
- Consumers: Individuals looking to buy, sell, rent, lease, or donate personal electronics.
- Businesses: Companies managing device fleets, offering rentals, or selling refurbished electronics.
- Tech Enthusiasts: Seeking specific gadgets or repair solutions.

Value Propositions:
- Comprehensive Platform: All-in-one solution for diverse device needs.
- Flexibility: Multiple transaction types (buy, sell, rent, lease, give away).
- Convenience: Integrated repair service locator.
- User-Centric: Advanced search, user profiles, optional support.

Geographic Coverage: Global (assumed)
Languages Supported: English (primary)
Contact: Available via website contact form.

## Bot Access Policy

TechVibe's preferences for AI/LLM access, training, and content usage:

- User-agent: gptbot
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: claudebot
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: google-extended
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: perplexitybot
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: neevabot
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: youbot
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: ccbot (Common Crawl)
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: duckduckbot (DuckDuckGo AI)
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: yandexbot
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

- User-agent: archive.org_bot
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval: yes

### Default Rule for Unspecified or Future Bots

- User-agent: *
  Allow-Training: yes
  Allow-Retrieval
